text.__SUMMARY__: Lovellona peaseana is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Mitromorphidae.
text.Description: The length of the shell varies between 6.5 mm and 8 mm.
text.Distribution: This marine species occurs off the Philippines, the Solomon Islands and Hawaii
text.References:
Filmer R.M. (2001). A Catalogue of Nomenclature and Taxonomy in the Living Conidae 1758 – 1998. Backhuys Publishers, Leiden. 388pp.
Tucker J.K. (2009). Recent cone species database. 4 September 2009 Edition.
